description: The Chick-fil-A College Football Hall of Fame in downtown Atlanta will offer free admission inside, and a party outside, on Saturday, Aug. 25.  The Atlanta attraction dedicated to all things college football is kicking off the upcoming season in a big way.
title: Get in to the College Football Hall of Fame for free tomorrow
title_page: Free day at College Football Hall of Fame in Atlanta Aug 25 2018
text:
The Atlanta attraction dedicated to all things college football is kicking off the upcoming season in a big way.
The Chick-fil-A College Football Hall of Fame will offer free admission inside, and a party outside, for everyone on Aug. 25.
READ | Midtown development committee to hear plans for Georgia Tech Microgrid
READ | 10th artist chosen to plaster Atlanta with murals for Super Bowl 2019
RELATED | More Things To Do this weekend in Atlanta
Guests may enter the business at no charge from 9 a.m. to 6 p.m. that day. Meanwhile, the second annual Chick-fil-A Peach Bowl Football Fest will take place the same day in front of the Hall of Fame, at 250 Marietta St., from 9 a.m. to 4 p.m.
Entertainment will consist of music, DJs, drum lines, step teams and cheerleaders, a press release said. The street will also be filled with inflatables and football-themed games.
